Ticket.SetTicketSection: UPDATE tGraphSlice SET IsUse=0 WHERE appName!='Peiwang'

GraphicsPriv.InsertGraphicPriv: IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT * FROM GraphicsPriv WHERE PrivGroupID={0} AND GraphicID={1} AND privtype={2}) INSERT INTO GraphicsPriv(PrivGroupID, GraphicID, privType) VALUES({0}, {1}, {2})
GraphicsPriv.DeleteGraphicPriv: DELETE FROM GraphicsPriv WHERE PrivGroupID={0} AND GraphicID={1} AND privtype={2}
GraphicsPriv.SelectDeptPrivGroup: SELECT DISTINCT privgroupID FROM tbDeptPrivGroup WHERE deptIdx!={0}
GraphicsPriv.SelectDeptFolder: SELECT f.GraphicFolderID FROM GraphicFolders f LEFT JOIN GraphicFoldersDept d ON f.GraphicFolderID=d.GraphicFolderID WHERE f.FolderOwnerID=1 AND f.FolderName!='所有人可见' AND (d.deptIdx!={0} OR d.deptIdx IS NULL)

ROOT.PlanApply_RelateFileld_selectsql: SELECT itemid, indx, planstop, planstart, planend, planrestore, auditstop, auditstart, auditend, auditrestor, stopduty, stopworker, workstop, startduty, startworker, workstart, endduty, endworker, workend, restoreduty, restoreworker, workrestore FROM tbWorkInfo WHERE itemid=@@标识列@@ ORDER BY indx ASC

ROOT.graphmanage_graph_graphTree_ftb: (SELECT * FROM(SELECT GraphicFolderID, FolderName, FolderOwnerID FROM GraphicFolders WHERE GraphicFolderID IN (SELECT GraphicFolderID FROM GraphicFoldersDept WHERE deptIdx LIKE CASE WHEN @@hdnPriv@@='1' AND @@hdnUserDept@@!='-1' THEN @@hdnUserDept@@ ELSE '%%' END) UNION ALL SELECT GraphicFolderID, FolderName, FolderOwnerID FROM GraphicFolders WHERE FolderOwnerID IN (SELECT GraphicFolderID FROM GraphicFoldersDept WHERE deptIdx LIKE CASE WHEN @@hdnPriv@@='1' AND @@hdnUserDept@@!='-1' THEN @@hdnUserDept@@ ELSE '%%' END) UNION ALL SELECT a.GraphicFolderID, a.FolderName, a.FolderOwnerID FROM GraphicFolders a LEFT JOIN GraphicFolders b ON a.FolderOwnerID=b.GraphicFolderID WHERE b.FolderOwnerID IN (SELECT GraphicFolderID FROM GraphicFoldersDept WHERE deptIdx LIKE CASE WHEN @@hdnPriv@@='1' AND @@hdnUserDept@@!='-1' THEN @@hdnUserDept@@ ELSE '%%' END) UNION ALL SELECT a.GraphicFolderID, a.FolderName, a.FolderOwnerID FROM GraphicFolders a LEFT JOIN GraphicFolders b ON a.FolderOwnerID=b.GraphicFolderID LEFT JOIN GraphicFolders c ON b.FolderOwnerID=c.GraphicFolderID WHERE c.FolderOwnerID IN (SELECT GraphicFolderID FROM GraphicFoldersDept WHERE deptIdx LIKE CASE WHEN @@hdnPriv@@='1' AND @@hdnUserDept@@!='-1' THEN @@hdnUserDept@@ ELSE '%%' END)) x UNION ALL SELECT 1, '全部', NULL) e
ROOT.graphmanage_graph_graphTree_stb: (SELECT a.id, a.name, b.GraphicFolderID FROM Graphics a LEFT JOIN Graphics_GraphicFolders b ON a.id=b.GraphicID WHERE a.isuse=1 AND a.name NOT LIKE '%缩略图') c

ROOT.NotifyReport_ddlVoltage: SELECT voltageIdx, voltageDesc FROM dbVoltage ORDER BY voltageValue
ROOT.NotifyReport_relaDevice_deletesql: DELETE FROM tbRelaDevice WHERE flowid=@@流程id@@ AND itemid=@@标识列@@
ROOT.NotifyReport_relaDevice_insertsql: INSERT INTO tbRelaDevice (flowid,itemid,deviceidx,devicename) VALUES (@@流程id@@,@@标识列@@,{0},{1})
ROOT.NotifyReport_relaDevice_selectsql: SELECT deviceidx,devicename FROM tbRelaDevice WHERE itemid=@@标识列@@ AND flowid=@@流程id@@
ROOT.NotifyReport_ddlStation: SELECT DISTINCT a.deptIdx as deptIdx, a.deptName FROM dbDept a LEFT JOIN dbStation b ON a.deptIdx=b.stationIdx
ROOT.othereventedit_ddlcmdstation: SELECT DISTINCT a.deptIdx, a.deptName FROM dbDept a LEFT JOIN dbStation b ON a.deptIdx=b.stationIdx WHERE a.isValid=1
ROOT.ListRepairEventZH_gantt: SELECT *,CASE WHEN state = 1 THEN '未确认' WHEN state = 2 THEN '已确认' ELSE '未接收' END AS statezw,colcolor= CASE WHEN tkovnote_finished= 1 THEN '#FF0000' ELSE '#000000' end FROM ( SELECT eventnum,a.*,(SELECT TOP 1 CASE stoprangesd WHEN '' THEN stoprangesd ELSE CASE (select rangezd1+rangezd2+rangezd3+rangezd4+rangezd5 rangezds FROM (select t3.modiid,max(case t3.ranking when 1 then t3.stoprangezd else '' end) rangezd1,max(case t3.ranking when 2 then +t3.stoprangezd else '' end) rangezd2,max(case t3.ranking when 3 then +t3.stoprangezd else '' end) rangezd3,max(case t3.ranking when 4 then +t3.stoprangezd else '' end) rangezd4,max(case t3.ranking when 5 then +t3.stoprangezd else '' end) rangezd5 FROM (select t1.modiid,ranking=(select count(*) from tbpwTkOvNote_modifyrangezd t2 where t2.modiid=t1.modiid AND t2.id <=t1.id), stoprangezd from tbpwTkOvNote_modifyrangezd t1) t3 group by t3.modiid) t4 WHERE modiid = (SELECT TOP 1 modiid FROM tbpwTkOvNote_modify WHERE eventid=a.tkovnote_eventid ORDER BY modiid DESC)) WHEN '' THEN stoprangesd ELSE stoprangesd+';' END END + (select rangezd1+rangezd2+rangezd3+rangezd4+rangezd5 rangezds FROM (select t3.modiid,max(case t3.ranking when 1 then t3.stoprangezd else '' end) rangezd1,max(case t3.ranking when 2 then +t3.stoprangezd else '' end) rangezd2,max(case t3.ranking when 3 then +t3.stoprangezd else '' end) rangezd3,max(case t3.ranking when 4 then +t3.stoprangezd else '' end) rangezd4,max(case t3.ranking when 5 then +t3.stoprangezd else '' end) rangezd5 FROM (select t1.modiid,ranking=(select count(*) from tbpwTkOvNote_modifyrangezd t2 where t2.modiid=t1.modiid AND t2.id <=t1.id), stoprangezd from tbpwTkOvNote_modifyrangezd t1) t3 group by t3.modiid) t4 WHERE modiid = (SELECT TOP 1 modiid FROM tbpwTkOvNote_modify WHERE eventid=a.tkovnote_eventid ORDER BY modiid DESC)) FROM tbpwTkOvNote_modify WHERE eventid=a.tkovnote_eventid ORDER BY modiid DESC) AS stoprange,(SELECT TOP 1 acceptuser FROM tbpwTkOvNote_modify WHERE eventid=a.tkovnote_eventid ORDER BY modiid DESC) AS acceptuser ,(SELECT TOP 1 senduser FROM tbpwTkOvNote_modify WHERE eventid=a.tkovnote_eventid ORDER BY modiid DESC) AS senduser,convert(varchar(16),isnull((SELECT TOP 1 sendtime FROM tbpwTkOvNote_modify WHERE eventid=a.tkovnote_eventid ORDER BY modiid DESC), '1900-01-01'),120) AS sendtime ,convert(varchar(16),(SELECT TOP 1 accepttime FROM tbpwTkOvNote_modify WHERE eventid=a.tkovnote_eventid ORDER BY modiid DESC),120) AS accepttime ,convert(varchar(16),isnull((SELECT TOP 1 stoptime FROM tbpwTkOvNote_modify WHERE eventid=a.tkovnote_eventid ORDER BY modiid DESC), '1900-01-01'),120) AS stoptime ,(SELECT TOP 1 state FROM tbpwTkOvNote_modify WHERE eventid=a.tkovnote_eventid ORDER BY modiid DESC) AS state ,(SELECT TOP 1 ifover FROM tbpwTkOvNote_modify WHERE eventid=a.tkovnote_eventid ORDER BY modiid DESC) AS ifover FROM tbpwTkOvNote_property a JOIN tbpwTkOvNote_tsdmsg b ON a.tkovnote_eventid=b.eventid {0})a where ifover = 0 order by state asc,stoptime desc
ROOT.ListRepairEventDD_gantt: SELECT *,CASE WHEN state = 1 THEN '未确认' WHEN state = 2 THEN '已确认' ELSE '未接收' END AS statezw,colcolor= CASE WHEN tkovnote_finished= 1 THEN '#FF0000' ELSE '#000000' end FROM ( SELECT eventnum, a.* ,(SELECT TOP 1 CASE stoprangesd WHEN '' THEN stoprangesd ELSE CASE (select rangezd1+rangezd2+rangezd3+rangezd4+rangezd5 rangezds FROM (select t3.modiid,max(case t3.ranking when 1 then t3.stoprangezd else '' end) rangezd1,max(case t3.ranking when 2 then +t3.stoprangezd else '' end) rangezd2,max(case t3.ranking when 3 then +t3.stoprangezd else '' end) rangezd3,max(case t3.ranking when 4 then +t3.stoprangezd else '' end) rangezd4,max(case t3.ranking when 5 then +t3.stoprangezd else '' end) rangezd5 FROM (select t1.modiid,ranking=(select count(*) from tbpwTkOvNote_modifyrangezd t2 where t2.modiid=t1.modiid AND t2.id <=t1.id), stoprangezd from tbpwTkOvNote_modifyrangezd t1) t3 group by t3.modiid) t4 WHERE modiid =(SELECT TOP 1 modiid FROM tbpwTkOvNote_modify WHERE eventid=a.tkovnote_eventid ORDER BY modiid DESC)) WHEN '' THEN stoprangesd ELSE stoprangesd+';' END END + (select rangezd1+rangezd2+rangezd3+rangezd4+rangezd5 rangezds FROM (select t3.modiid,max(case t3.ranking when 1 then t3.stoprangezd else '' end) rangezd1,max(case t3.ranking when 2 then +t3.stoprangezd else '' end) rangezd2,max(case t3.ranking when 3 then +t3.stoprangezd else '' end) rangezd3,max(case t3.ranking when 4 then +t3.stoprangezd else '' end) rangezd4,max(case t3.ranking when 5 then +t3.stoprangezd else '' end) rangezd5 FROM (select t1.modiid,ranking=(select count(*) from tbpwTkOvNote_modifyrangezd t2 where t2.modiid=t1.modiid AND t2.id <=t1.id), stoprangezd from tbpwTkOvNote_modifyrangezd t1) t3 group by t3.modiid) t4 WHERE modiid =(SELECT TOP 1 modiid FROM tbpwTkOvNote_modify WHERE eventid=a.tkovnote_eventid ORDER BY modiid DESC)) FROM tbpwTkOvNote_modify WHERE eventid=a.tkovnote_eventid ORDER BY modiid DESC) AS stoprange,isnull((SELECT TOP 1 stoptime FROM tbpwTkOvNote_modify WHERE eventid=a.tkovnote_eventid ORDER BY modiid DESC), '1900-01-01') AS stoptime ,(SELECT TOP 1 state FROM tbpwTkOvNote_modify WHERE eventid=a.tkovnote_eventid ORDER BY modiid DESC) AS state ,(SELECT TOP 1 ifover FROM tbpwTkOvNote_modify WHERE eventid=a.tkovnote_eventid ORDER BY modiid DESC) AS ifover FROM tbpwTkOvNote_property a JOIN tbpwTkOvNote_tsdmsg b ON a.tkovnote_eventid=b.eventid {0} ) a where ifover = 0 order by state asc,stoptime desc
ROOT.AllUser: SELECT userID, userName from dbUser WHERE usertype=1
ROOT.AllVoltage: SELECT voltageIdx, voltageDesc FROM dbVoltage ORDER BY voltageValue
ROOT.editmb2_pbname: SELECT mbid,xcname FROM tbmoban ORDER BY xcname
ROOT.editmb_mbname: SELECT mbid,mbname FROM tbmoban WHERE mbid NOT IN (SELECT mbid FROM tbxianchang) ORDER BY mbname
ROOT.editevent0501_CmdGantt: SELECT *,colcolor= CASE WHEN exetime!='2100-12-30' THEN '#FF0000' else '#000000' end FROM tbpwTkOvNote_Cmd where 1=1 {0}
ROOT.editevent0501_ddltype: SELECT id,name FROM tbpwAccidentTrip_type ORDER BY id
ROOT.AssignmentBook_New: SELECT devname,type,itemnum,stationid as deptname,auditstop as stoptime FROM tbPlanDay WHERE auditstop > '{0}' AND (state IS NULL or state=-1)
ROOT.AssignmentBook_Change: SELECT stationid as deptname,itemnum,devname,remark,auditstart as worktime FROM tbChangedWork WHERE auditstart > '{0}'
ROOT.AssignmentBook_Operate: SELECT program,way FROM tbOprate WHERE itemid={0}
ROOT.LinshiDaidian_yshctrl_18: SELECT *,colcolor= CASE WHEN tkovnote_finished= 1 THEN '#FF0000' ELSE '#000000' end FROM tbpwTkOvNote_property where 1=1 {0} order by tkovnote_startpart desc
ROOT.GetDS: select dsname,dsdesc from tbdatasource where dsdesc!='' order by dsdesc
ROOT.GetTable: select tblname,tbldesc from tbdatatable where dsname={0} and tbldesc!='' order by tbldesc
ROOT.GetColumn: select colname,coldesc from tbdatacolumn where dsname={0} and tblname={1} and coldesc!='' order by coldesc
ROOT.GetIdentityInsertCol: select colname from tbdatacolumn where dsname={0} and tblname={1} and coltype='id'
